Description:

Mind’s lair is a local coop platform game with horror features inspired by Lovecraft. You play as Nina and Emma Zann, two sisters trying to understand the mystery around their lives.

Nina is an innocent and humble girl; She has an illness ever since she was born. This sickness manifests as a sort of necrosis in her hand and indistinguishable voices in her head that often make her faint. However, this gives her some abilities to control the light. A blessing or a curse?

Emma is a lumberjill, always worried about her sister. She decided to help her sister with everything she had. They then go to an asylum looking for a cure. However, everything seems different after Nina’s last outbreak.

Features:

Lovecraft-inspired story.
Dark pixel art style.
Platformer, puzzle and horror features creating an exciting gameplay.
Unique atmospheric music.
Intensive local-coop multiplayer: Work together or die trying.
Collect notes to unravel the story.
Use different tactics and combos to overcome uncanny challenges.
